review: The Fire TV Stick does what I needed to do. I like it. There are times, I wish it would have buttons or command features. Overall, I am happy with this product.
author: Andy V.

review: I currently am using it with a slingbox M1 to watch my Satellite programming from one house to another house.  I am not using the top quality setting and the looks are every bit as good as if I was watching the program at the other house.  Another feature will be to reduce the number of satellite boxes and replace them with the Fire TV Stick and the Slingbox App.
author: OldnGrey

review: Like its ease to set up. Haven't owned it long enough to use all it's features.
author: Brian Smith

review: I absolutely love my Fire Stick so much I bought 2!!
author: Amazon Customer

review: So easy to use. Purchased a different one that had to be replaced.
author: HMurphy

review: Thank you very much. I was in the hospital getting new knees, & unable to let u know that I had received it & was very pleased. Thank you, again, & I would recommend it 2 anyone even thinking about it. Very good product, very good investment, very good choice.
author: Christine L Zeitz

review: Works well--nice to have streaming available in my room!
author: Christine
